@grogfella They should bring back dental. Numerous studies prove your heart health is directly correlated to oral care.
@1staidgirl @grogfella Unless you have a dental/healthcare plan. Prescriptions you pay, unless you're on premium assistance. Or health plan.
@grogfella Well, ours isn't 100% free. Like, long wait times, but if you pay, you can jump the line. No dental, except free clinics. You pay
@grogfella Not too bad at all. Don't some of the northern countries have universal healthcare there? Like Sweden, Denmark, and the like?
@grogfella It's crazy down there. Obama had the right idea, but it wasn't the best way of doing it. Some have it, some pay a lot, apparently
@grogfella Our taxes pay for this healthcare, but it's a small price to pay because the health of our citizens improves our society overall.
@grogfella With our (according to Trump) shambles of a medical system. It is not perfect, but we do have universal healthcare.
@grogfella My brother had to save up over $600 US so he and his wife could have a baby. This was 17 years ago, and he has VA insurance!
